title: MassID NFT IPFS Record
description: Complete MassID NFT IPFS record schema defining waste tracking metadata, chain of custody events, and NFT display attributes

$schema.title: JSON Schema URI
$schema.description: URI of the JSON Schema used to validate this record

hash.title: Schema Hash
hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the JSON Schema this record was validated against

type.title: MassID Schema Type
type.description: Schema type identifier for this record

version.title: Schema Version
version.description: Version of the schema, using semantic versioning

ipfs_uri.title: Schema IPFS URI
ipfs_uri.description: IPFS URI for this JSON Schema when the primary schema URI is unavailable

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: ISO 8601 creation timestamp for this record

external_id.title: External ID
external_id.description: UUID identifier for external system references

original_content_hash.title: Original Content Hash
original_content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the original JSON content including private data before schema validation

content_hash.title: Content Hash
content_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of RFC 8785 canonicalized JSON after schema validation

viewer_reference.title: Metadata Viewer Reference
viewer_reference.description: References to the metadata viewer dApp, including immutable and latest entry points

ipfs_cid.title: Viewer IPFS CID
ipfs_cid.description: IPFS CID of the metadata viewer dApp build

integrity_hash.title: Viewer Integrity Hash
integrity_hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the published viewer bundle to verify integrity

deployment.title: Deployment Environment
deployment.description: System environment where this record was generated

data_set_name.title: Data Set Name
data_set_name.description: Name of the data set for this record

data.title: MassID Data
data.description: MassID data containing waste tracking events and supporting information

waste_properties.title: Waste Properties
waste_properties.description: Waste material classification, regulatory codes, and net weight for the tracked batch

subtype.title: Waste Subtype
enum: EFB similar to Garden, Yard and Park Waste

local_classification.title: Local Classification
local_classification.description: Regulatory classification reference for the waste material

code.title: Ibama Classification Code
code.description: Ibama waste classification code in the format NN NN NN with required spaces and optional trailing *

system.title: Classification System
system.description: Authority or standard providing the classification code

net_weight_kg.title: Net Weight
net_weight_kg.description: Net weight of the waste batch in kilograms (kg)

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Geographic locations involved in the waste chain of custody, including origin, processing, and destination sites

items.title: Location
items.description: Geographic location with address and coordinate information

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: Two-letter country code following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard

responsible_participant_id_hash.title: Responsible Participant ID Hash
responsible_participant_id_hash.description: Anonymized ID of the participant responsible for this location

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Geographic latitude coordinate in decimal degrees with maximum 1 decimal place precision (~11km accuracy for city-level)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Geographic longitude coordinate in decimal degrees with maximum 1 decimal place precision (~11km accuracy for city-level)

participants.title: Participants
participants.description: Supply chain participants involved in waste management operations. Roles include Waste Generator, Hauler, Processor, Recycler, Network Integrator, Methodology Author, Methodology Developer, Network, and Community Impact Pool

items.title: Participant
items.description: A participant in the waste management supply chain

roles.title: Participant Roles
roles.description: Roles of the participant in the waste management supply chain

items.title: Participant Role
items.description: Role that a participant plays in the waste management supply chain

events.title: MassID Events
events.description: Chronological sequence of waste lifecycle events: Pick-up, Weighing, Drop-off, Sorting, and Recycling operations

items.title: MassID Event
items.description: Lifecycle event describing custody, processing, documentation, or recycling steps

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Type of event, indicating this is a Pick-up event

data.title: Pick-up Event Data
data.description: Data associated with the pick-up event

vehicle_type.description: Type of vehicle used for pick-up operations
vehicle_type.title: Vehicle Type

weight_kg.title: Pick-up Waste Weight
weight_kg.description: Weight of waste collected at the origin location, measured in kilograms (kg)

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Type of event, indicating this is a Weighing event

data.title: Weighing Event Data
data.description: Weighing operational details including capture method, scale type, container or vehicle information, and weight measurements

weighing_capture_method.title: Weighing Capture Method
weighing_capture_method.description: Method used to capture weight data

scale_type.title: Scale Type
scale_type.description: Type of scale used to weigh the load

container_type.description: Type of container or vehicle holding the waste material during the weighing operation
container_type.title: Container Type

vehicle_type.description: Type of vehicle used during weighing
vehicle_type.title: Vehicle Type

gross_weight_kg.title: Gross Weight
gross_weight_kg.description: Total weight including vehicle/container before tare in kilograms (kg)

tare_kg.title: Tare Weight
tare_kg.description: Weight of the empty vehicle or container in kilograms (kg)

oneOf.title: Drop-off Event
oneOf.description: Waste delivered to the destination location

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Type of event, indicating this is a Drop-off event

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Type of event, indicating this is a Sorting event

data.title: Sorting Event Data
data.description: Weight measurements for sorting operations: initial weight entering the process and weight deducted (contaminants, moisture, etc.)

initial_weight_kg.title: Initial Weight
initial_weight_kg.description: Weight of the material entering the sorting process in kilograms (kg)

deducted_weight_kg.title: Deducted Weight
deducted_weight_kg.description: Weight removed during sorting (e.g., contaminants or moisture) in kilograms (kg)

oneOf.title: Recycling Event
oneOf.description: Waste processing or recycling completion event, marking the final transformation of waste material

timestamp.title: Event Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

participant_id_hash.title: Participant ID Hash
participant_id_hash.description: Reference to participant in the participants array

location_id_hash.title: Location ID Hash
location_id_hash.description: Reference to location in the locations array

event_name.title: Event Name
event_name.description: Type of event, indicating this is a Recycling event

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Official regulatory documents linked to specific chain of custody events via event_id. Document types include Transport Manifest and Recycling Manifest

items.title: MassID Attachment
items.description: Attachment associated with a specific MassID event, linked by event_id

type.title: Attachment Type
type.description: Type of supporting attachment linked to a MassID event

document_number.title: Document Number
document_number.description: Official regulatory document number issued by authorities, when applicable

issued_at.title: Issued At
issued_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the attachment was issued

event_id.title: Event ID
event_id.description: Identifier of the event this attachment belongs to

blockchain.title: Blockchain Information
blockchain.description: Blockchain deployment information including smart contract address, network, and token identifier

smart_contract_address.title: Smart Contract Address
smart_contract_address.description: Ethereum-compatible address of the smart contract that mints and manages this NFT

chain_id.title: Chain ID
chain_id.description: Blockchain network chain identifier (e.g., 137 for Polygon mainnet, 80002 for Amoy testnet)

network_name.title: Blockchain Network Name
network_name.description: Blockchain network name. Supported values include Polygon and Amoy

name.title: NFT Name
name.description: Full display name for this NFT, typically including token identifier, waste type, and weight

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: Compact name for UI summaries, tables, or tooltips, typically including token identifier

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable summary describing the waste batch, origin, processing method, and chain of custody. Ideally, maximum 300 characters.
examples: This MassID represents 3 metric tons of organic food waste from Enlatados Produção, tracked through complete chain of custody from generation to composting.
This RecycledID represents 2.5 metric tons of recycled plastic bottles processed by Green Solutions Ltd.

image.title: Image URI
image.description: IPFS URI pointing to the NFT preview image displayed in marketplaces and wallets

background_color.title: Background Color
background_color.description: Hexadecimal color code used as background color in NFT marketplace displays

animation_url.title: Animation URL
animation_url.description: IPFS URI pointing to an animated or interactive media file for enhanced NFT display

external_links.title: External Links
external_links.description: Optional list of public resource links with labels

items.title: External Link
items.description: External link with label and description

label.title: Link Label
label.description: Display name for the external link

url.title: Link URL
url.description: Direct URI to the linked resource

description.title: Link Description
description.description: Optional context about what the link provides

attributes.title: MassID Attributes
attributes.description:
Array of NFT attributes describing waste characteristics, origin, logistics, and lifecycle events.

Required attributes (9): Waste Type, Waste Subtype, Weight (kg), Origin City, Pick-up Vehicle Type, Recycling Method, Pick-up Date, Drop-off Date, Recycling Date
Optional attributes (5): Local Waste Classification ID, Recycling Manifest Number, Transport Manifest Number, Weighing Capture Method, Scale Type

value.title: Waste Type
value.description: Category or type of waste material

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Waste Subtype Attribute
anyOf.description: Regulatory or operational waste subtype (e.g., Food, Food Waste and Beverages)

value.title: Waste Subtype
value.description: Specific subcategory of waste within a waste type
enum: EFB similar to Garden, Yard and Park Waste

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Weight Attribute
anyOf.description: Net batch weight in kilograms (kg) for this MassID attribute with numeric display

value.title: Weight
value.description: Net batch weight in kilograms (kg) for this MassID

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Origin City Attribute
anyOf.description: City or municipality where waste was originally generated and picked up

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Pick-up Vehicle Type Attribute
anyOf.description: Type of vehicle used to transport waste from the origin location during pick-up

value.title: Pick-up Vehicle Type
value.description: Type of vehicle used for waste pick-up operations

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Recycling Method Attribute
anyOf.description: Processing or recycling method applied to transform the waste material

value.title: Recycling Method
value.description: Method used for recycling or processing the waste

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Pick-up Date Attribute
anyOf.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste was picked up from the origin location attribute

value.title: Pick-up Date
value.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste was picked up from the origin location

anyOf.title: Drop-off Date Attribute
anyOf.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste was delivered to the destination location attribute

value.title: Drop-off Date
value.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste was delivered to the destination location

anyOf.title: Recycling Date Attribute
anyOf.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste recycling or processing was completed attribute

value.title: Recycling Date
value.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when waste recycling or processing was completed

anyOf.title: Local Waste Classification ID Attribute
anyOf.description: Regulatory waste classification code in Ibama format (NN NN NN with optional trailing asterisk)

value.title: Ibama Classification Code
value.description: Ibama waste classification code in the format NN NN NN with required spaces and optional trailing *

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Recycling Manifest Number Attribute
anyOf.description: Official recycling manifest document number issued by regulatory authorities, linked to the Recycling event (optional)

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Transport Manifest Number Attribute
anyOf.description: Official transport manifest document number issued by logistics authorities, linked to transport events (optional)

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Weighing Capture Method Attribute
anyOf.description: Method used to capture weight measurements during weighing operations (optional)

value.title: Weighing Capture Method
value.description: Method used to capture weight data

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits

anyOf.title: Scale Type Attribute
anyOf.description: Type of weighing equipment used to measure waste weight (optional)

value.title: Scale Type
value.description: Type of scale used to weigh the load

display_type.title: Display Type
display_type.description: How the trait should be displayed in marketplace UIs

max_value.title: Max Value
max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits
